  • Between Moon Tides
    Hacking nature to save the saltmarsh sparrow

    On a quiet ribbon of saltmarsh in Rhode Island, septuagenarian Deirdre isn’t prepared to accept the loss of her beloved saltmarsh sparrow - the species is facing extinction before 2050 due to elevated high tides inundating nests and drowning fledgling birds. Will this be the year they manage to save them?
